name: Deadline (itch) (ScreenSavorStudios)
description:
Rebecca Tompson is an investigative reporter on the story of a life time. Which is good, because it's going to cost her her life is she doesn't get it on her editor's desk before dawn!

Thanks to a badly phrased command to a shape-shifting Murder Cat (M.C.)she accidentally summoned, Rebecca will have to uncover the truth behind the supernatural disappearances plaguing her town, and expose a thread of corruption and murder that will rock the foundation of her city.

Featuring:

Shakyra Dunn as Rebecca Tompson
https://www.shakyradunnva.com/

http://www.twitter.com/shakyradunn
